name: A Farmer's Lonely Tale
description:
OVERVIEW:

This is Kowara Squad's UE4 summer game jam submission. 

Follow a young farmer boy as he explores the bright, yet mysterious lands in search of magical seeds. What happens when you collect enough...?

INSTRUCTIONS:

You may use <WASD> to move your character.
Hit the <Space> key to jump
<E> to plant the seeds that you have in your inventory slot.
You must collect 5 seeds at least to grow to a fine healthy tree.
Find enough seeds around the level and plant them back in your patch of soil.

Good luck!
